demo.name: To-Do List
demo.description: Showcases many Mavo features (properties, lists, data actions, local storage) in very little code.

demo.name: Artist Portfolio
demo.description: Artist portfolio with pictures and descriptions stored on Github. Showcases the various ways to edit images (linking, upload, copy/paste, drag & drop).

demo.name: Editable homepage
demo.description: Uses the TinyMCE plugin for rich text editing.

demo.name: Mortgage Calculator
demo.description: Showcases a more spreadsheet-like Mavo application.

demo.name: Events list
demo.description: A list of past and future events with countdowns. Showcases how effectively Mavo works with dates and how the whole HTML page can be a Mavo app.

demo.name: Color picker
demo.description: An HSLA color picker. Showcases how responsive Mavo expressions are, as well as properties that depend on other properties.

demo.name: Interactive Mavo logo
demo.description: Showcases how well Mavo works with SVG.

demo.name: 3D model viewer
demo.description: Showcases how Mavo works with [A-Frame](https://aframe.io/)â€”A web framework for building 3D/AR/VR experiences.

demo.name: Calculators
demo.description: Showcases how mv-default can gracefully handle calculations with circular dependencies. It also showcases how Mavo functions can be extended by simply defining global JS functions (namely, a `gcd()` function).

demo.name: Shopping list
demo.description: Showcases [custom data actions](/docs/actions) for copying items across lists, even if the lists don't have exactly the same structure.

demo.name: Dice roller with history
demo.description: Showcases [custom data actions](/docs/actions), including multiple data actions on the same control.

demo.name: Word game
demo.description: A language learning game for two people, where one enters the phrase and the other tries to click on words to put them in the right order. Showcases [custom data actions](/docs/actions)

demo.name: E-shop
demo.description: Two Mavo apps: Product listing stored on Github, cart stored locally. Uses Paypal HTML API for checkout and a custom data action for adding to cart.

demo.name: Decisions
demo.description: An app to list pros and cons (with weights!) to help you make a decision.

demo.name: Restaurant visit log
demo.description: Showcases hierarchy (3 levels of nested lists) and how scoping works with it in expressions.

demo.name: Talks list
demo.description: The first Mavo demo ever created. Showcases dates and expressions with dates. See a similar app in action on [Lea Verou's website](http://lea.verou.me/speaking) and [Chris Lilley's website](http://svgees.us/talks.html)

demo.name: Invoicing system
demo.description: Showcases one of the many ways to make a "multipage" app that lets you open items to view more details without leaving the page. For actual multipage apps with different URLs, checkout the [Forkgasm](https://forkgasm.com) demo.

demo.name: Contact manager
demo.description: A replica of a contact list app, with multiple emails and phone numbers per person.

demo.name: Forkgasm Food Blog
demo.description: Food blog with recipes and restaurant visits. Showcases how you can use Mavo to have truly multipage apps with different URLs (thanks to [Netlify's URL rewrite rules](https://www.netlify.com/docs/redirects/))

demo.name: SVG Path builder
demo.description: One of the most complex demos, showcases `mv-if` for conditionals, dynamic default values, custom UI, Mavo expressions in SVG

demo.name: Memory Game
demo.description: A card matching game (also known as [Concentration](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Concentration_(game))). Showcases a way to divide an app's features between separate Mavo apps (game state, game board, themes, attempts stats), [UI customization](/docs/ui), and [custom data actions](/docs/actions) (including multiple data actions on the same control).

demo.name: Mavordle
demo.description: Clone of the famous [Wordle game](https://www.powerlanguage.co.uk/wordle/).
